instructions.description: MOVe contents of Register SSS to Register DDD.
TEST contents of Register SSS.
Jump to address in Register SSS (move address to Register 7).
ADD contents of Register SSS to contents of register DDD. Results to DDD.
SUBtract contents of Register SSS from contents of register DDD. Results to DDD.
CoMPare Register SSS with register DDD by subtraction. Results not stored.
logical AND contents of Register SSS with contents of register DDD. Results to DDD.
eXclusive OR contents of Register SSS with contents of register DDD. Results to DDD.
CLeaR Register to zero.
INCrement contents of Register DDD. Results to DDD.
DECrement contents of Register DDD. Results to DDD.
one's COMplement contents of Register DDD. Results to DDD.
two's complement contents of Register DDD. Results to DDD.
ADd Carry bit to contents of Register DDD. Results to DDD.
Get Status WorD in register DD. Bits 0-3, 8-11 set to 0. Bits 4, 12=C; 5, 13=OV; 6, 14=Z; 7, 15=S.
No Operation.
Software Interrupt; pulse to PCIT pin.
Restore Status WorD from register SSS; Bit 4 to C, Bit 5 to OV, Bit 6 to Z, Bit 7 to S.
N=0, SWAP bytes of register RR. S equals Bit 7 of results of SWAP. N=1, not supported.
N=0 Shift Logical Left one bit. Zero to low bit. N=1 Shift Logical Left two bits. Zero to low 2 bits.
N=0, Rotate Left one bit using C as bit 16.
N=0 Shift Logical Left one bit using C as bit 16. Zero to low bit. N=1, Shift Logical Left two bits using C as bit 17 and OV as bit 16. Zero to low 2 bits.
N=0, Shift Logical Right one bit. Zero to high bit. N=1, Shift Logical Right two bits. Zero to high two bits.
N=0, Shift Arithmetic Right one bit. Sign bit copied to high bit. N=1, Shift Arithmetic Right two bits. Sign bit copied to high 2 bits.
N=0, Rotate right one bit using C as bit 16. N=1 Rotate right two bits using C as bit 16 and OV as bit 17.
N=0, Shift Arithmetic Right one bit, thru C. Sign bit copied to high bit. N=1, Shift Arithmetic Right two bits, thru OV and C. Sign bit copied to high 2 bits.
HaLT after next interruptible instruction is executed. Resume on start
Set Double Byte Data for the next instruction which must be an external reference instruction.
Enable Interrupt System. Not Interruptable.
Disable Interrupt System. Not Interruptable.
Terminate Current Interrupt. Not Interruptable.
CLeaR Carry to zero. Not Interruptable.
SET Carry to one. Not interruptable.

sections.title: JUMP
notes: Bits 2-7 of the second word form bits 10-16 of the Destination Address.
Bits 0-9 of the third word form bits 0-9 of the Destination Address.

instructions.opcode_format: Word 1: 0 000 000 100, Word 2: X XX1 1AA AAA, Word 3: X XXX AAA A00
instructions.description: Jump to address. Program counter is set to 16 bits of A's.

instructions.opcode_format: Word 1: 0 000 000 100, Word 2: X XX1 1AA AAA, Word 3: X XXX AAA A01
instructions.description: Jump to address. Enable interrupt system. Program counter is set to 16 bits of A's.

instructions.opcode_format: Word 1: 0 000 000 100, Word 2: X XX1 1AA AAA, Word 3: X XXX AAA A10
instructions.description: Jump to address. Disable interrupt system. Program counter is set to 16 bits of A's.

instructions.opcode_format: Word 1: 0 001 BAA AAA, Word 2: X XX1 BAA AAA, Word 3: X XXX AAA A00
instructions.description: Jump and Save Return address (PC+3) in register designated by 1BB. Program counter is set to 16 bits of A's. BB != 11.

instructions.opcode_format: Word 1: 0 000 BAA AAA, Word 2: X XX1 BAA AAA, Word 3: X XXX AAA A01
instructions.description: Jump and Save Return and Enable interrupt system. Return (PC+3) is saved in register 1BB. Program counter is set to 16 bits of A's. BB != 11.

instructions.opcode_format: Word 1: 0 000 BAA AAA, Word 2: X XX1 BAA AAA, Word 3: X XXX AAA A10
instructions.description: Jump and Save Return and Disable interrupt system. Return (PC+3) is saved in register 1BB. Program counter is set to 16 bits of A's. BB != 11.

sections.title: BRANCHES
notes: The Branch instructions are Program Counter Relative, i.e. the Effective Address = PC + Displacement.
P-P is the Displacement and S is 0 for + and 1 for -.
For a forward branch an addition is performed.
For a backward branch a one's complement subtraction is performed.
7/9: 7 Cycles if test condition is not true, 9 cycles if true.

instructions.description: Branch unconditional. Program counter relative (+1025 to 1024)
No Operation, two words
Branch on Carry (Branch if Logical Greater Than or Equal). C=1.
Branch on No Carry (Branch if Logical Less Than). C=0
Branch on Overflow. OV=1
Branch on No Overflow. OV=0
Branch on Plus. S=0
Branch on Minus. S=1
Branch on Zero (Branch if Equal). Z=1
Branch on No Zero (Branch if Not Equal). Z=0
Branch if Less Than. S XOR OV = 1
Branch if Greater than or Equal. S XOR OV = 0
Branch if Less than or Equal. Z | (S XOR OV) = 1
Branch if Greater Than. Z | (S XOR OV) = 0
Branch if Unequal Sign and Carry. C XOR S = 1
Branch on Equal Sign and Carry. C XOR S = 0

instructions.opcode_format: 1 000 S1E EEE P PPP PPP PPP
instructions.description: Branch if External condition is True. Field EEEE is externally decoded to select 1 of 16 conditions.

instructions.opcode_format: 0 000 SSS 001 A AAA AAA AAA AAA AAA
instructions.description: MoVe Out data from register SSS to address A - A. Not interruptible.

instructions.opcode_format: 0 010 DDD 001 A AAA AAA AAA AAA AAA
instructions.description: MoVe In data from address A - A to register DDD.

instructions.opcode_format: 0 011 DDD 001 A AAA AAA AAA AAA AAA
instructions.description: ADD data from address A - A to register DDD. Results DDD.

instructions.opcode_format: 0 100 DDD 001 A AAA AAA AAA AAA AAA
instructions.description: SUBtract data from address A - A from register DDD. Results to DDD.

instructions.opcode_format: 0 101 DDD 001 A AAA AAA AAA AAA AAA
instructions.description: CoMPare data from address A-A with register SSS by subtraction. Results not stored.

instructions.opcode_format: 0 110 DDD 001 A AAA AAA AAA AAA AAA
instructions.description: logical AND data from address A - A with register DDD. Results to DDD.

instructions.opcode_format: 0 111 DDD 001 A AAA AAA AAA AAA AAA
instructions.description: eXclusive OR data from address A - A with register DDD. Results to DDD.

instructions.opcode_format: 0 000 SSS 111 I III III III III III
instructions.description: MoVe Out Immediate data from register SSS to PC + 1 (field). Not interruptible.

instructions.opcode_format: 0 010 DDD 111 I III III III III III
instructions.description: Move In Immediate data to register DDD from PC + 1 (field).

instructions.opcode_format: 0 011 DDD 111 I III III III III III
instructions.description: Add Immediate data to contents of register DDD. Results to DDD.

instructions.opcode_format: 0 100 DDD 111 I III III III III III
instructions.description: SUBtract Immediate data from contents of register DDD. Results to DDD.

instructions.opcode_format: 0 101 DDD 111 I III III III III III
instructions.description: CoMPare Immediate data from contents of register SSS by subtraction. Results not stored.

instructions.opcode_format: 0 110 DDD 111 I III III III III III
instructions.description: logical AND Immediate data with contest of register DDD. Results to DDD.

instructions.opcode_format: 0 111 DDD 111 I III III III III III
instructions.description: eXclusive OR Immediate data with the contents of register DDD. Results to DDD.

sections.title: INDIRECT ADDRESSED DATA-REGISTER
notes: MMM: Source data is located at the address contained in Register R1 - R6.
MMM=6: MVO instruction post-increment R6. PUSH data from Register SSS to the Stack. Other instructions pre-decrement R. PULL data from the Stack to be used at the first operand.

instructions.description: MoVe Out data from register SSS to the address in register MMM. Note: MMM=4,5,6 or 7 not supported. Not interruptible.
PUSH data from Register SSS to the stack. Not interruptible.
Move In data from the address in register MMM to register DDD.
PULL data from the stack to Register DDD.
ADD data located at the address in register MMM to contents of register DDD. Results to DDD.
SUBtract data located at the address in register MMM from contents of register DDD. Results to DDD.
CoMPare data located at the address in register MMM with contents of register SSS by subtraction. Results not stored.
logical AND contents of register DDD with data located at the address in register MMM. Results to DDD.
eXclusive OR contents of register DDD with data located at the address in register MMM. Results to DDD.

sections.title: IMMEDIATE DOUBLE BYTE DATA - REGISTER
notes: I-I: UUUUUUUULLLLLLLL; L-L indicates low byte of literal; U - U indicates upper byte.
The SDBD instruction is normally supplied by the assembler as required to properly generate machine code.

instructions.opcode_format: 0 000 000 001, 0 010 DDD 111, LLL LLL LLL LLL LLL, UUU UUU UUU UUU UUU
instructions.description: Move In Immediate double byte data to register DDD.

instructions.opcode_format: 0 000 000 001, 0 011 DDD 111, LLL LLL LLL LLL LLL, UUU UUU UUU UUU UUU
instructions.description: ADD Immediate double byte data to contents of register DDD. Results to DDD.

instructions.opcode_format: 0 000 000 001, 0 100 DDD 111, LLL LLL LLL LLL LLL, UUU UUU UUU UUU UUU
instructions.description: SUBtract Immediate double byte data from contents of register DDD. Results to DDD.

instructions.opcode_format: 0 000 000 001, 0 101 DDD 111, LLL LLL LLL LLL LLL, UUU UUU UUU UUU UUU
instructions.description: CoMPare Immediate double byte data with contents of register SSS by subtraction. Results not stored.

instructions.opcode_format: 0 000 000 001, 0 110 DDD 111, LLL LLL LLL LLL LLL, UUU UUU UUU UUU UUU
instructions.description: logical AND Immediate double byte data with contents of register DDD. Results to register DDD.

instructions.opcode_format: 0 000 000 001, 0 111 DDD 111, LLL LLL LLL LLL LLL, UUU UUU UUU UUU UUU
instructions.description: eXclusive OR Immediate double byte data with contents of register DDD. Results to register DDD.

sections.title: INDIRECT ADDRESSED DOUBLE BYTE DATA - REGISTER

instructions.description: Move In double byte data from the address in register MMM to register DDD.
ADD double byte data located at the address in register MMM to contents of register DDD. Results to DDD.
SUBtract double byte data located at the address in register MMM from contents of register DDD. Results to DDD.
CoMPare double byte data located at the address in register MMM with the contents of register SSS by subtraction. Results not stored.
logical AND double byte data located at the address in register MMM with contents of register DDD. Results to DDD.
eXclusive OR double byte data located at the address in register MMM with contents of regsiter DDD. Results to DDD.

symbolic_notation.description: The following symbolic notation is used in all CP1600 instruction documentation.

register_address_mode_mmm.description: direct address in location following instruction
indirect address for Register 4, post increment
indirect address for Register 5, post increment
indirect address for Register 6, post increment for MVO only; indirect address for Register 6, pre decrement for all instructions except MVC
indirect address for Register 7, post increment. (Immediate data in location following instruction.)
